explains: n. 感觉迟钝；不灵敏性；昏迷

sentences.en: The failure of the talks was mainly due to insensitivity and mistiming.
sentences.cn: 会谈失败主要是由于反应迟钝和时机不对。

sentences.en: The government has behaved with crass insensitivity.
sentences.cn: 政府表现得粗暴愚蠢，毫不体恤。

sentences.en: I was ashamed and appalled at my clumsiness and insensitivity toward her.
sentences.cn: 我为自己对她如此笨拙和冷漠而感到羞耻和震惊。
